comment._content:
John Puroy Mitchel, who was elected Mayor of New York in November, 1913.

Here's another Bain/LOC photo taken on this occasion:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4445872456/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Shaping up!   Looks like we'll need to add the one-ell "Mitchel" to the special reminder list for one-tee in "Mathew" Brady and two-ells  Charles "Willson" Peale.
